Key Match Events: Yusei Kikuchi struck out 12 in seven innings
Yainer Diaz hit a two-run single
Jeremy Peña hit a two-run triple
Peña scored on a wild pitch
Cole Ragans set a Royals franchise record with eight consecutive strikeouts
Garrett Hampson robbed Alvarez of a home run
Post-Match Reflections: Ragans expressed disappointment in the loss
Bobby Witt Jr. stated they need to move on and prepare for the next game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ryan Pressly pitched a scoreless ninth for his third save of the season
Royals claimed veteran outfielders Robbie Grossman and Tommy Pham off waivers
Others: Bobby Witt Jr. had a rough time in Houston, going 0 for 11 in this series
Witt leads the majors in hits, batting average and runs
